name: Pyramid Mapping
description:
Map yourself a way through the dark and dangerous tunnels of a pyramid. Fly drones, draw your own map, and go exploring! Be aware of dangerous traps, an ominously spiky ceiling, and mystic idols that allow you to go deeper and even deeper into the pyramid.

Made for Ludum Dare 48.

Features

  • Drones
  • Free drawing on maps
  • A very deep pyramid
  • Atmospheric torchlight
  • Mystical Idols
  • Possible treasure

Team

  • Valentijn Muijrers
  • Leon van Oldenborgh
  • Joeri Ridder
